text: @realDonaldTrump My God, our country is in a terrible crisis due to the coronavirus and all this idiot does is pound twitter with his campaign agenda. I’m sure his fatness is glued to the TV watching the Democratic primary instead of working to help alleviate the disaster unfolding in our country
